Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Southbound Reroute near 71st/Jeffrey
ShortDescription: Southbound  71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Stony island, 73rd and Exchange: due to, street blockage near 71st/Jeffrey.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound  #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Stony island, 73rd and Exchange: due to, street blockage near 71st/Jeffrey.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
